channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 03/14/2024 # New Features # Language Model Optimization: Upgraded SeaChat Agent model Enhanced appointment scheduling prompt improvements. Bugfix # Fixed random language summaries. 03/07/2024 # New Features # Knowledge Base: Now supports Video, Audio, and Spreadsheet files, enabling more comprehensive content sharing and collaboration. Bugfix # Extended support for longer video and audio files, with a maximum duration of 15 minutes. Fixed bug in uploading spreadsheets.
